TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CroppedBitmap extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize

remarks.format:
## Remarks CroppedBitmap implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties. Property changes can occur only during object initialization. Call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> to signal that initialization has begun and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit%2A> to signal that initialization has completed. After initialization, property changes are ignored.
CroppedBitmap objects created by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Int32Rect%29> constructor are automatically initialized, and properties cannot be changed.
Metadata tags related to image data must be updated if an image is saved to a file after a transform is applied.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.SourceRect%2A> property of this class to define the area of the bitmap that is to be cropped.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties. To initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> created using this constructor, you must perform property initialization between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit%2A> calls.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> objects created using this constructor are automatically initialized. After initialization, property changes are ignored.

remarks.format:

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this , making deep copies of this object's values. When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property will be even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property was

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object). For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty SourceProperty

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the rectangular area that the bitmap is cropped to.
Docs.value: The rectangular area that the bitmap is cropped to. The default is <xref:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Empty%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A with a SourceRect set to will render the entire image. A rectangle that is not fully within the bounds of the bitmap will not render. ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
